weather.precipitation: Winter in Antwerp is cold and damp with occasional snowfall.
weather.what_to_pack: Pack warm clothing, including a coat, hat, gloves, and waterproof footwear.

tourism.crowds: Antwerp is less crowded during Winter compared to peak tourist seasons.
tourism.costs: Prices for accommodations and attractions are generally lower during Winter.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations in advance, especially around Christmas and New Year.

highlights.name: Antwerp Christmas Market
highlights.description: Experience the festive atmosphere with traditional food, drinks, and crafts.
highlights.tips: Visit in the evening for beautiful lights and decorations.

highlights.name: New Year's Eve Fireworks
highlights.description: Watch spectacular fireworks displays to ring in the New Year.
highlights.tips: Head to the Scheldt River for great views.

highlights.name: Winter in Antwerp Festival
highlights.description: Enjoy cultural events, music performances, and art exhibitions.
highlights.tips: Check the event schedule for specific activities.

highlights.name: Chinese New Year Celebrations
highlights.description: Participate in traditional parades, dances, and food tastings.
highlights.tips: Explore the Chinatown area for authentic celebrations.

highlights.name: Antwerp Fashion Weekend
highlights.description: Discover the latest trends in fashion with runway shows and designer presentations.
highlights.tips: Shop for unique pieces at local boutiques.

highlights.name: Ice Skating at Groenplaats
highlights.description: Glide on the outdoor ice rink in the heart of Antwerp.
highlights.tips: Rent skates on-site and enjoy hot chocolate afterwards.

recommended_activities.practical_tips: Visit in the morning for active animals and fewer crowds.
